Users and Cars¶

Account Functions¶

account.py is used to pass all the user credential, information during the booking session

class model.account.Account[source]¶

All functions in this file are stored in this class.

static get_password_input()[source]¶

Get the inputted password from the user interface

static get_user_name_input()[source]¶

Get the inputted username fro mthe user interface.

static hash_salt_password(raw_input)[source]¶

Hash password before sending it for verification.

static validate_password_input(password)[source]¶

Valid password contains at least: 8 characters, 1 upper case, 1 lower case, 1 digit, 1 special characters

static validate_username_input(username)[source]¶

Pass the inputted username against a regex to make sure it’s valid.

static verify_credential(input_password, encrypted_password)[source]¶

Verify a password hash against the inputted password.

static verify_credential_locally(username, input_password)[source]¶

Retrieve the password hash for local verification

Car Functions¶

car.py is a singleton to handle and pass all the car information throughout the program

class model.car.Car(first_login=True, ap_addr='DC:A6:32:4A:0C:41')[source]¶

All functions in this file are stored in this class.

property ap_addr¶

Getter Function

property booking_id¶

Getter Function

property car_id¶

Getter Function

static detect_device(device_mac_address)[source]¶

Wait until bluetooth is on and stable (loop throught the unstable period)

Get all nearby devices mac address. Loop through all nearby devices – if the car mac address is found, return TRUE

property first_login¶

Getter Function

first_login_to_car()[source]¶

Set the first login flag – it’s the first time the user has entered the car.

static getInstance()[source]¶

Static access method.

get_assgined_engineer_info()[source]¶

Get the informatio nabout the engineer assigned to this car

return_car()[source]¶

Set the status of the car as returned – the user is done with it.

Client Functions¶

client.py is to create TCP socket instances to send message to master pi

class model.client.Client(host='10.247.169.92', port=9956)[source]¶

All functions in this file are stored in this class

close_socket()[source]¶

Close the socket to reuse the port for different purposes

receive_message()[source]¶

Retrieve and decode the latest message received back from the server.

send_message(message)[source]¶

Send a message to the server.

Decoding Functions¶

code.py is a utility class to encode and decode data for better conversion re-usable code

class model.code.Code(raw_data)[source]¶

All functions in this file are contained within this class.

static decode_content(raw_data)[source]¶

Try to decode some arbitrary content into UTF-8 characters.

property decoded_content¶

Getter for decoded content

static parse_json(content)[source]¶

Try to parse arbitrary content as JSON

Customer Functions¶

Each time the customer login, Customer class will create a instance which contain all user information

class model.customer.Customer(get_username_option)[source]¶

All functions in this file are contained in this class.

return_car()[source]¶

User is done with this car. Clear them from the local record where they are stored as the active user, and call a function to return the car.

Engineer Functions¶

Each time the engineer login, Engineer class will create a instance which contain all user information

class model.engineer.Engineer[source]¶

All functions within this file are stored in this class

close_backlog()[source]¶

Let the master Pi know it has to close an open engineering backlog for this specific car.

scan_code()[source]¶

Scan the engineer’s QR code

Storage for current active user¶

Class Database is to create and connect to the database for recording and retrieving data. This is only for storing the current user. Google cloud databae is used for all other application features.

class model.localDatabase.LocalDatabase[source]¶

All functions in this file are stored in this class.

static create_table(columns, tb_name, db_path=None)[source]¶

Create a new table.

static delete_record(tb_name, conditions, parameters, db_path=None)[source]¶

Delete a record

static insert_record(tb_name, values, parameters, db_path=None)[source]¶

Insert data record

static select_a_record(columns, tb_name, extra='', db_path=None)[source]¶

Retrieve data of one record

static select_a_record_parameterized(columns, tb_name, extra, parameters, db_path=None)[source]¶

Select records based on criteria set in given parameters.

static setup_connection(db_path)[source]¶

Create a connection to the local database at the given path.
